@Section

Package silicondust.ant.taskdefs

See org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.
Author:
Allen D. Ball
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HDHRDiscoverTask
    Ant Task to discover HDHomeRun tuners on the network.
    HDHRPrimeClientTask
    Abstract Ant base Task for tasks that invoke HDHRPrimeClient methods.
    HDHRPrimeClientTask.Lineup
    Ant Task to invoke HDHRPrimeClient.getLineup().
    HDHRPrimeClientTask.Record
    Ant Task to invoke HDHRPrimeClient.stream(Integer,Integer,Integer) and save the stream to a File.
    HDHRRecordingTask
    Ant Task to display metadata about an HDHRRecording.
    HDHRRecordingTask.Metadata  
    HDHRTunerTask
    Ant Task for HDHomeRun tuners.
    HDHRTunerTask.Directive  
    HDHRTunerTask.Get
    HDHRTunerTask get HDHRTunerTask.Directive.
    HDHRTunerTask.Options
    Ant Task to get all tag names from a HDHomeRun tuner.
    HDHRTunerTask.Scan
    Ant Task to scan a HDHomeRun tuner for channels.
    HDHRTunerTask.Set
    HDHRTunerTask set HDHRTunerTask.Directive.
